morning.transliteration: Allahumma bika asbahna wa bika amsayna
morning.meaning: O Allah, by You we enter the morning and by You we enter the evening.
Glory be to Allah and praise is His.

evening.transliteration: Allahumma bika amsayna wa bika asbahna
evening.meaning: O Allah, by You we enter the evening and by You we enter the morning.
I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah.

anxiety.arabic: حَسْبِيَ اللَّهُ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ
anxiety.meaning: Allah is sufficient for me. There is no deity except Him.

anxiety.arabic: لَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ
anxiety.transliteration: Lā ḥawla wa lā quwwata illā billāh
anxiety.meaning: There is no power and no strength except with Allah.

grateful.meaning: All praise is for Allah, Lord of all worlds.

grateful.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ مَا أَصْبَحَ بِي مِنْ نِعْمَةٍ
grateful.transliteration: Allahumma mā aṣbaḥa bī min ni‘mah
grateful.meaning: O Allah, whatever blessing I have is from You.

forgiveness.meaning: My Lord, forgive me and accept my repentance.

sick.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اشْفِنِي شِفَاءً لَا يُغَادِرُ سَقَمًا
sick.transliteration: Allahumma ishfinī shifā’an lā yughadiru saqaman
sick.meaning: O Allah, cure me with a cure that leaves no illness.
Remove the harm, O Lord of mankind.

protection.arabic: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
protection.transliteration: A‘ūdhu bikalimātillāhi t-tāmmāti min sharri mā khalaq
protection.meaning: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from the evil of what He created.
Say: I seek refuge in the Lord of daybreak.

before_sleep.meaning: In Your name, O Allah, I die and I live.
